title: New client has very delayed input
body: Moving through the client scrolling up things is extremely laggy. There's no no frame drops. There's insane input lag. My Mouse works fine, and my computer is fine, it just takes a hell of a long time to scroll through things. I can't view post game results either on the new client. Also on the new client it sometimes just likes to crash while I'm in champ select. Luckily I'm in call with a duo that can tell me when they've started because I can't join back into champ select after picking my champ without dodging. The old client also just black screens when entering champ select. I'm pretty sure this is a problem on the new client too. Honestly if there were an old client that was actually stable or a new client that looked good (In my opinion) and was stable, then I would use that over legacy or alpha any day. Even if it meant taking away hextech crafting from the legacy client. Prices to pay to play the game.

replies.body: Input delays and black screens can indicate an unstable connection that's failing to download assets or suffer from packet loss.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a solid analysis of your specific issue.  The results should also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your case as well.  Let me know if it helps!
